name: ip_country
description: Get the country to which the ip address belongs.

name: ip_details
description: Get the details of the ip address, including type, continent, country, region, city and so on.

name: get_ip
description: Get the ip of the current user.

name: ip_more
description: Get the geographic information, ASN, Ranges, Hosted Domains and IP Whois of the ip address.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
